development._IMPORTANT_COMMENT: Do not edit these unless you know what you're doing! Edit values under default instead.

default._token_comment: The token for the bot! Create a Discord bot account and paste the token here.
default._secret_comment: The secret for the bot - used for the Discord login feature.
default._id_comment: The ID of the bot - needed for the Discord login feature
default._ownerid_comment: The ID of your account - enable developer mode in Discord and right click your name --> Copy ID
default._demoid_comment: The ID for the demo guild - follow instructions above ^ except click on the guild instead
default._shards_comment: How many shards you want to use - just leave it to 1.
default._callback_comment: Users are redirected to this URL upon login.
default._base_www_comment: This URL is the base URL for colour links. Make sure to include a / in the end
default._prefix_comment: What prefix you use in front of commands: (prefix)colour for example
default._support_comment: A Discord invite link to the support server of the bot
